favourite.article: There is nothing good in me and my flesh is so worldly. Praise the Lord that He still loves me and I can linger on Him!

I am so glad there is a someone like this someone. It seems so hard to stay connected with people. Either they move on in life to a new place or you move on in life to a new place like school or a job. it just seems like they liked you just because you were in their class or you were their co worker ,but when that is done you just get the feeling they really don't care about you anymore. You call them they don't answer because you don't see them a lot. I have experienced this Going from feeling really importamt to feeling like nothing. I'm just like is there anyone who likes me for just who I am and not what I am? Is there some one who will answer me when I call? My answer is Jesus. He doesn't care about what you are. He just wants you to open up to Him because He cares and loves you so much that one can not understand half of His love towards you and others. Just remember this it matters to Him concerning You 1 Peter 5 :7 How can't we love such a one. If you can love the Lord, You can't love anyone. The Lord is always there wherever and whenever because He is the Spirit. You just have to call His Name Acts 2:21 and Romans 10:9
There is no someone like this One! Thank You Lord for being this someone, the precious One, the most wonderful One!
This is amazing song. O Lord Jesus, Thanks.
Our Lord is our ultimate friend. He's the One who could understand what we are going through. He could comfort us. His person is so tender and meek.
Me transporta al lugar más tranquilo y confortable que conozco, mi espíritu, gracias señor por ser la persona más especial...
Love this song! In fact, Christ is for everyone as long as we turn to Him. He is always for us, ALWAYS indeed!!!
Christ is the Someone for me. Praise the Lord!

We should not tell God how big our storm is, tell our storm how big God is. I let God have my life. You can do more with it than I can. Thank You for not leaving or forsaking me. You are my GREAT SOMEONE, Lord Jesus. I am so much in love with You.
Yes Lord, You are my precious and my wonderful One. I love You Lord Jesus!
This Someone is the good Shepherd. Thank You Lord that You are this One! I love You Lord for all You are for us. You are the lovely One.
I Love THIS Someone!!

Is there a Spanish version of this song?
Dear Lord Jesus, You are this Wonderful One who will always love us, take us as we are, and who will not leave us, ever! I am touched, I turn, I love You.

This song really touches me, especially when I'm very depressed. I feel as though nothing compares to what I'm going through. But when I hear this song, I realize that our Lord has gone through what we went through, and much worse. This song just touches me since I really have this Someone to turn to when I'm feeling sad. Lord, Thank You that You're this Someone!
Lord, I love You!!!

This is a wonderful hymn. I love it very much. Every line carries life in it. Whenever I'm struck in a very complicated situation especially times when others cannot understand even if you detail them I find it very difficult to go on. But there is this blessed Redeemer reminding this song in me. Sometimes there is no love in me for Him, yet right in my spirit there is this wonderful "someone who can love me When there's no love in me". I JUST FALL IN LOVE WITH HIM AGAIN.
Such a comfrotable hymn... He is this Someone...
Praise the Lord for such a hymn! It's been a great comfort for me in my hard times when I feel alone. There is a Someone! Hallelujah!

On Lord's Day, 3 saints who came from the Philippines and a couple fromt the church in Longbeach join a Love-feast in Chula Vista. After the lunch they gathered together and sang this song. The couple from Longbeach, gave the background of this song. It was written for the daugther of the composer, who was in her teen. She said, that there was no one in this world that can understand her. With all the question as it was written in the song, the father composed this song and sang it to her and she was touched and shed in tears. The saints in Chula Vista were also touched with the story behind the song. Thank the Lord, the Christ is this Someone who knows all our need. Praise the Lord.
There is a Someone who knows me yet He still WANTS me....what a mercy! Thank You Lord and we love You so much.
Praise the Lord, saints! It's so wonderful to know that Christ is the Someone who is always there for us, in every situation. We just need to love Him.

Amen! Lord, thank You You are this Someone! You know us more than we do ourselves. This song is such a good reminder many times when we think there's no one to be there for us. Saints, we just need to love this Someone!
Lord u are the someone who know inside me. ow wonderfull one.

I am really touched, comforted and blessed to learn that theres someone always there for me in abundance so much so that i can share him with the multitudes of brothers and sisters. Praise our Lord JESUS Christ the all sufficient one. Christ is the someone for all of us.

Alabado sea nuestro precioso Señor que nos muestra Su inmensurable amor cada día. Verdaderamente El es todo! Y este himno nos lleva a confesar al universo que no hay nada ni nadie como este maravilloso Alguien, pues nada es realidad fuera de Él. Gracias Señor Jesús por ser el Gran Yo Soy!

Praise the Lord there is a Someone! Christ knows all our situations, He knows what we are going through, He knows what we need, He knows everything! Praise the Lord there is this Someone whom we can lean on every moment each day!

Praise the Lord! There is no really someone like the One that lives in us! This Someone is the all-inclusive Christ dwelling within us! Oh! this song really touches me... I love this... With this, I'm assured that whatever happens Christ is there... Amen.

This song is deeply touches me most, Bro. Howard the author of this song is absolutely right. In my experienced through out the years of those i've wasted no one could really understand my defeated living as christian.through all my hardest experienced,the stormy times and even my broken heart strings no one i could lean on and could even fix it except this Someone "CHRIST LIVETH IN ME". Lord Jesus Christ! Thank U for what U are to me.how sinful i am still U let Yourself be my special,precious and dearest "Someone" ..LOrd continue to work Yourself within me.Increase Yourself to me and even i commit myself this another year to come(2005). Oh LOrd im begging! remember my consecration.Preserve me until Your coming back.I really need Your grace and mercy!!! Amen.
